doc.field: CHICAGO BOARD OF TRADE DELIVERABLE GRAIN STOCKS

as of Friday, April 3 , 1986. WHEAT - 2,602,000 bushels including 1,647,000 in CHICAGO and 955,000 in TOLEDO. CORN - 26,620,000 bushels including 11,502,000 in CHICAGO, 14,478,000 in TOLEDO and 640,000 in ST LOUIS. SOYBEANS - 1,879,000 bushels including 254,000 in CHICAGO and 1,625,000 in TOLEDO. OATS - 871,000 bushels including zero in CHICAGO and 871,000 in MINNEAPOLIS. Reuter
